vulnerability.name: USN-6990-1
vulnerability.description: Johannes Kuhn (DasBrain) discovered that znc incorrectly handled user input under certain operations. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code on a user's system if the user was tricked into joining a malicious server.

statements.status_notes: znc could be made to execute arbitrary code on a user's system if they were persuaded to join a malicious server. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
